resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete all local data ?\n This action cannot be undone

•	Tap the [Add Receipt] button to manually add your expenses.
•	Fill in the date, store/place, category, amount, and optionally tax.
•	Attach a clear photo of your receipt using [Capture] or [Gallery].
•	Save your receipt to track and organize your expenses.
•	Use [Summary] and [Stats] screens to analyze your spending clearly.
